title: Jaime King pairs green coat with skinny jeans on shopping trip with Kyle Newman in Beverly Hills
text:
They've been married since 2007 and have two sons together.

And on Wednesday, Jaime King and Kyle Newman enjoyed a shopping date in Beverly Hills.

The couple carried beverages to go as they strolled along browsing the boutique stores.

Couple: Jaime King, 40, and Kyle Newman, 43, enjoyed a shopping date in Beverly Hills, carrying beverages to go as they strolled along browsing the boutique stores

Jaime, 40, was dressed in a dark green coat fastened with large safety pins over a white sweater and blue skinny jeans.

She stepped out in gray trainers and sported cat's eye sunglasses.

Her bobbed blonde hair was blown out and curled under and she was made-up with matte dark red lip color and a black manicure.

Kyle, 43, was dressed down in a logo'd black t-shirt and black shorts along with neon trainers.

Stylish: Jaime, 40, was dressed in a dark green coat fastened with large safety pins over a white sweater and blue skinny jeans. She added gray trainers and sported cat's eye sunglasses

Retail trip: Kyle, 43, was dressed down in a logo'd black t-shirt and black shorts along with neon trainers. The couple have been married since 2007

Jaime and Kyle recently celebrated their oldest child's sixth birthday.

The couple took James Knight to Disneyland and Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge, along with his younger brother Leo Thames, four.

The trip was a huge success as evidenced by the smiling selfie of the family of four that Kyle posted to his Instagram.

Special day: Jaime and Kyle recently celebrated son James Knight's sixth birthday with a trip to Disneyland and Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge, along with his younger brother Leo Thames, four
description: The couple carried beverages to go as they strolled along browsing the boutique stores.
